      • createGroup

        @RequestMapping(path="/create",
                method=POST)
public String createGroup​(@ModelAttribute
                          UserGroup userGroup,
                          org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                          Locale locale)
        Create a new UserGroup.
        Parameters:
        userGroup - the UserGroup from the request.
        model - the model to add violation constraints to.
        locale - the locale used by the browser.
        Returns:
        the route back to the creation page on validation failure, or the details page on success.
